person.persName: Alpheus Washington Bascom (Bath County, Kentucky, student, clerk, private and first lieutenant (C.S.A.))

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, student, clerk, and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Sylvanus Clark Bascom and Mary Nicholas Owings Bascom. Married to Nancy Jane Dawson Bascom in Bath County, Kentucky, on April 15, 1863. Father of William J. Bascom and Mary N. Bascom. Student in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Bath County in 1850. Clerk in Lafayette County, Missouri, in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Lafayette County in 1860. Served in the 5th Kentucky Mounted Infantry (C.S.A.) as private and first lieutenant from October 21, 1861 to November 29, 1862.
